entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
